testcase.name: Total amount validation
testcase.system-out: Given Android on the main screen............................................passed And Android clicks to my account icon.......................................passed And Android enters "validEmail" to email checkbox...........................passed And Android enters "validPassword" to password checkbox.....................passed And Android clicks login button.............................................passed And Android clicks the homepage icon........................................passed When Android clicks a physical product......................................passed And Android clicks "Sepete Ekle" with textview..............................passed And Android clicks the homepage icon........................................passed When Android clicks on the second item......................................passed And Android clicks "Sepete Ekle" with textview..............................passed And Android clicks Sepetim button...........................................passed Then Android confirms the total amount......................................passed
